attributes.action: Stop wasting tax cash and stop the investigation into the actions of Mark Field
attributes.background:
My son's school was locked down 48 hours ago due to a knife man in the area. Armed police attended.
Previously London Bridge, Westminster and assignation of Jo Cox
If Mark Field hadn't acted it might have been too late. He used reasonable force stopping someone who put herself into that situation

rejection.details: This is a decision for the police and not the UK Government or Parliament.
